english.segment1: - verse -. I love the way you put your little feet on mine. When im trying to say goodnight. You take me by the hands, and you say lets dance. And we dance all around the room. To the sound of this beautiful inaudible tune.
english.segment2: - chorus -. Thats the way you move me. You prove me wrong. When i say im tired and i want to go home. You shake me. You take me away. You make me say thats my favorite song. Baby thats my favorite song.
